body.description: Bloch Soft Stretch Face Masks are designed for breathability, perfect fit, and comfort. Dual layers of top quality soft stretch fabric make the Bloch A001 mask ideal for all climates, all-day use, and pefect for wearing during movement and exercise. Effective in protecting against the elements of everyday urban life, the A001 mask features UV protection, anti-dust, and soft stretch material that allows it to contour to your face. The adjustable ear loops ensure a snug fit and the mask is machine washable and . The Bloch Soft Stretch Face Mask contains an agent to control odors and to prevent microorganisms from degrading the product.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bloch Soft Stretch Reusable Face Mask Bloch has been solving dancers needs since 1932 and is now taking its design skills and technical expertise to produce a face mask. The machine washable masks are embedded with Nano Zinc Oxide particles in the fabric’s fibres. The soft stretch fabric with adjustable ear loops form a perfect breathe easy fit whatever your face shape.
Features include: Two layers of high-density fabricAnti-dustWashable and reusableAdjustable stoppers for ear loops for perfect fit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for small faces, soft and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Of all the masks I've tried, this is the best for me. I ordered 15 and use a new one every day, throwing them in the wash with the darks. I'm a petite woman with a small face, and most masks I've tried are too large. Some of those other masks are workable but uncomfortable, and some are just comical. This one fits perfectly to my face. But those with larger faces might also like it - my fiance has a wider face and thinks it is comfortable too. The ear straps easily adjust for wider faces.I've seen some complaints about the seam in the middle, but that should only be a concern if you care about aesthetics. The seam on the inside is indented and soft, and is not bothersome or uncomfortable. The seam on the outside does protrude a bit, but because the mask is black, I think it is not noticeable. So far no one has pointed and laughed, so there's that. I think it is nice aesthetically because it fits well and is basic black.This passed the "candle test" - I wasn't able to blow out a candle while wearing it. So while of course it isn't a medical-grade mask, it is better for sure than single-ply, 100% polyester, or neck gaiter face coverings. It is fairly breathable - certainly better than others that I have. It fits snugly to the face, so if you want something looser around the nose and lips, this probably isn't the mask for you.Finally, it folds up fairly compactly to slip into a pocket when not needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Usually when I would wear a mask I would always keep it down around my chin when I want near anyone because most of the masks I had were uncomfortable, not a good fit. The fabric didn't feel right, the mask didn't look right on me.I like the shape of this mask. The nose portion can be pulled all the way up to the upper nose between the eyes and then curls down underneath the eyes rather than straight across. I thought that gave mask a better appearance when wearing it. The picture usual looks better than the actual product, but the pictures provide were accurate to what i received.The fabric is soft and stretches. I don't have any difficulty breathing when I have it on like I did with the majority of other masks that I've worn. Sometimes I forget I'm even wearing it when I have it on.The only thing that I didn't like was that the ear straps were painful for a little while until I got used to them because I like for the mask to fit snug (somewhat tight) over my face and because the straight are somewhat thin (like most masks), then start to hurt my ears after a while, but after a week or 2 of wearing it I feel a lot more comfortably than in the beginning.I will order again when I'm in need of more masks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: NICE AND SOFT. EASE OF BREATHING THRU. ONLY PROBLEM STRAP IS A LITTLE CUTTING BEHIND EAR.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for myself and they are so comfortable and soft that my family ended up stealing them from me haha 😅 I recommend altho perhaps hide them better 😭

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s pretty comfortable, but pretty small really don’t like it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy these! Especially if you have glasses!
reviews.reviewText: These are incredible, especially to wear with glasses. They’re big enough to pull them up high on your nose, so that when you rest your glasses slightly on top of the mask, it doesn’t fog.They are great value for the money, and I love the adjustable ear pieces. They’re flexible enough to fit my smaller ears, and my husband thinks they’re comfortable to wear with his big beard.I’ve washed them a couple of times now, and they come out great. I just hang dry them, and they’re usually dry by morning. The material is so soft as well, it’s much more comfortable and lightweight than other masks I’ve used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit for the family
reviews.reviewText: My husband has a very difficult time finding masks that fit him properly (he has a wide face), many of the masks he finds are way too tight to be comfortably worn and does not prefer the tie kinds. The mask itself is very light weight while remaining durable. The straps are VERY elastic so they are able to stretch to fit my husbands head comfortably, but they are also adjustable so my children can wear them as well (ages 9 and 12- petite). All in all, I would highly recommend these masks for the whole family if you want something soft, durable, and versatile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable cloth mask I’ve found
reviews.reviewText: Since we’re likely going to be in masks for a while I figure it’s time to reviewBasically I’ve tried a ton of face masks and for cloth ones these are easily my go-to. They are very comfortable (to the point I forget to take it off sometimes), they don’t suction to my face when I’m breathing (but sometimes when running), and they’re adjustable. I’ve purchased three packs so I can rotate through them and don’t regret it one bit.Yes the ridge looks a little silly, but it makes ALL the difference!

Purchased these during the pandemic, I have to say they were the most comfortable masks that I've worn to date! Love the material and the fact that I was wash them and reuse them, therefore limiting the amount of trash in our landfills. Would highly recommend the use of these should there be another pandemic outburst.

This is handmade normal fabric mask with horrible quality not sure where all the stars come from. Paid $100 for some fabric looking mask thing super disappointed to see people make money off deceiving people.

This is the perfect mask for my spouse and i, we've bought these twice now and it's the only mask we will wear. It's very comfortable, adjustable, the fabric is soft and breathable and it sits nice on the face because of the seam down the front and doesn't get sucked into your mouth or nose when you breathe heavily

The fit is good. Shape of the mask is great. I’ve been having problems with most masks as I have a small face most masks ride up & hit my eyes.My only complaint is they are thick for warmer weather (will be fine for winter) & the seam that’s on the inside. It’s too big & starts to bother me after wearing it a while

Very happy with these masks, the material is very soft and has some stretch to it so they fit the face very well and feel great. I have tried several other types of masks and was not impressed at all with the quality or fit of them but these ones here I would highly recommend and will purchase again if needed.
